name: cirra-ai-sf-ai-agentforce-testing
description: Comprehensive Agentforce testing skill with dual-track workflow: multi-turn API testing (primary) and CLI Testing Center (secondary). Uses Cirra AI MCP Server for org access instead of Salesforce CLI.

author.name: Cirra AI (based on original by Jag Valaiyapathy)

compatibility: Requires API v65.0+ (Winter '26) and Agentforce enabled org. Requires Cirra AI MCP Server connection.
